definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: A concrete plan in the power factory using waste incinerating is developed.
sentences.chinese: 並給出在垃圾焚燒發電廠的具體實施方案。

sentences.english: When completed, the power station will have two 25,000 kw generators.
sentences.chinese: 這座發電廠建成後將有兩臺兩萬五千千瓦的發電機。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流溼式冷卻塔的節水是火力發電廠節水工作的關鍵。

sentences.english: Coal-fired power plants are factories of death.
sentences.chinese: 燒煤的火力發電廠堪稱死亡工廠。

sentences.english: The trains carrying coal to power plants are death trains.
sentences.chinese: 將煤炭運輸到發電廠的列車堪稱死亡列車。

sentences.english: And nowadays it is the world’s biggest power station working on the solid fuel.
sentences.chinese: 目前它是世界上最大的還在使用固體燃料的發電廠。

sentences.english: The key is to ensure that future coal plants are using CCS.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是確保今後的燃煤發電廠使用碳捕獲和封存技術。

sentences.english: In Anhui and Henan provinces, some power plants shut down.
sentences.chinese: 安徽與河南省的一些發電廠已經關閉。

sentences.english: One's going to be a power plant, and one is a distributed resource.
sentences.chinese: 前者將成爲發電廠，後者是一種分散式資源。

sentences.english: Binary plants release essentially no emissions.
sentences.chinese: 雙循環發電廠基本沒有排放物產生。

sentences.english: That is about the same as a large coal-fired power station.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的發電功率成本，和大型的燃煤發電廠差不多。

sentences.english: The coal conveyer belt is an important transport machine of thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 輸煤膠帶是火力發電廠的重要運輸機械。

sentences.english: The main difference between nuclear and fossil-fuelled power stations is an economic one.
sentences.chinese: 在覈和化石加燃料發電廠之間的主要差別是經濟的。

sentences.english: That has squeezed the profit margins of power producers and distributors.
sentences.chinese: 這擠壓了發電廠和輸變電企業的利潤空間。

sentences.english: A Study of Environmental Protection Problem of Coal-Fired Power Plant;
sentences.chinese: 給煤機是燃煤火力發電廠的重要設置。

definition: a power station/an electricity generating plant
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
